message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm still looking for a price that reflects the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $175. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's unique features and quality.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $175 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $160?

I understand that $160 is still a bit of a stretch for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you at $165, which is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal. It's a fair compromise, considering the product's value and my costs.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $165 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $155?

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated, Bob. I've already compromised a lot on the price. I'm willing to make one more concession, but that's it. I'll meet you at $162.50, which is the absolute lowest I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to start considering other options.
I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $162.50. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $155 and $162.50. Would you be willing to consider a price of $158.75?

I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised a lot on the price. I'm going to have to draw the line here. I'll meet you at $159.50, but that's as low as I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm going to have to start considering other options.

I understand that you're not willing to go any lower, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with $159.50. I'm willing to meet you at $157.50, but that's the absolute maximum I can go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $120.
